showScoreExcerpt:
“Nostalgic ’80s charm mingled with 2023 theatrical capability is a winning combination. Even if certain numbers had me desperate for my own little bout of plutonium poisoning, the toddler ate them up. And ultimately, her joy is what I walked out of the theater holding on to.”

Read more
